parameters.responseBody: ={"success": true, "message": "Report sent to melobyrro@gmail.com", "files": {{ $('Generate Report').item.json.totalFiles }}, "repos": {{ $('Generate Report').item.json.totalRepos }}}

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  rule_id,
  state,
  dismissed_at,
  reminded_at,
  completed_at,
  checked_at
FROM audit_results
WHERE state IN ('dismissed', 'completed', 'reminded')
ORDER BY checked_at DESC;
